descript.abstract: The Mapunit Crop Yield table lists commonly grown crops and their expected yields for the referenced map unit as a whole. Yields for individual map unit components are given in the Component Crop Yield table.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3143

attr.attrdef: Crop yield units per unit area for the specified crop.
The expected yield per acre of the specific crop without supplemental irrigation.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: A non-connotative string of characters used to uniquely identify a record in the Mapunit Crop Yield table.
The expected yield per acre of the specific crop with irrigation.
The unique identifier of a record in the Mapunit table. Use this column to join the Mapunit Crop Yield table to the Mapunit table.
The expected yield per acre of the specific crop with irrigation.
The expected yield per acre of the specific crop without supplemental irrigation.
The expected yield per acre of the specific crop without supplemental irrigation.
The common name for the crop.
The expected yield per acre of the specific crop with irrigation.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
